item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Discord Server # We will use Discord to communicate between class meetings. Please use this forum to post any questions or comments. Join the class Discord server using the invitation link: https://discord.gg/WaH4haCmmn. Note that we are using the same server as previous classes, so you may see some activity there from before. IDE Installation # Unlike other tools like Processing or TouchDesigner, openFrameworks does not come with its own development environment (IDE).
